snippet: The buses from World Wide Travel, which operated the one that crashed in March, killing 15 people, were shifted to a new company, state officials said.
lead_paragraph: The buses from World Wide Travel, which operated the one that crashed in March, killing 15 people, were shifted to a new company, state officials said.

headline.main: After Bronx Crash, a Bus Fleet Stays on the Road
headline.print_headline: After Bronx Crash, a Bus Fleet Stays on the Road
headline.seo: Bus Company Shut After Casino Crash Reappears Under New Name
